title: Night Siren
description: After years on the run, Josie, an Army Ranger who witnessed the massacre of an entire Bosnian village by US private security contractors during the War in Yugoslavia, finally learns the true identity of the man behind the killings, who is now a US Ambassador. While Central Intelligence wants Josie dead, he is also pursued by a young female operative with an addiction to voyeurism and a lunatic obsessed with reincarnation. Josie risks everything to warn an old friend about a secret that could change the course of history while trying to stay one step ahead and live long enough to see whether or not he has what it takes to kill the Ambassador and save the only person left in the world who matters to him...the Ambassador's daughter.
author: David Tanager
